mdx.excerpt: In our last post i went through the anatomy of a DNS request, but one thing i left out is that DNS has some inbuilt compression to try to make messages smallerâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Compression in DNS messages
frontmatter.description: When writing my DNS client "Who are you?" i had no idea that there was compression built into DNS messages. This blog post will explain how compression in DNS messages work and how i went about solving it.

frontmatter.title: A DNS-message breakdown no one asked for
